info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 11:51PM CDT until June 25 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BIG STONE...DEUEL...HAMLIN...GRANT AND EASTERN CODINGTON COUNTIES... At 1150 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from South Shore to near Kranzburg to Lake Albert, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... South Shore, Kranzburg, Goodwin and Troy around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Stockholm, Twin Brooks, School Lake, Bullhead Lake, Strandburg, Dempster, Clear Lake, Estelline, La Bolt, Altamont, Lake Alice, Tunerville, Poinsett Colony, Revillo, Albee, Moritz, Gary, Toronto and Astoria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
